name: Metal Army Strike 3D War Force
description:
Metal Soldier Strike is a modern action-packed run and gun warfare game. Earth is under attack by metal force. Get your weapons and Be ready for the ultimate action-shooting game. Are you ready to Become a metal soldier shoot games? Collect guns, grenades, bullets, and slugs to destroy enemies in this 3D game shooting. Are you ready for this exciting survive action squad game? Once you enter the war arena, take an aggressive approach and keep moving, shooting all enemies on your way and call allies if you need any help. Pick up packs of shells to get additional ammo and mini medkits to restore health to get back to the mission.
Grab your guns in the best of shooting war game shoot up and save the world.

Features:

- Different Metal characters to choose from.
- Different kind of attackers.
- Challenging metal fight game.
- Awesome graphics and 3d environment.
- Lots of enemies to fight.
- Classic weapon designs.
- Metal survivors action squad game.
- Easy to Play.
